00029 NI::NI()
00030 {
00031     name = "NI";
00032     //interface_connections.resize(1);
00033     mc = (Component*)(new MC());
00034     ((MC*)mc)->parent = this;
00035     ((MC*)mc)->ni = this; 
00036     ((MC*)mc)->Init();  
00037     ni_recv = false;
00038 }

00050 void
00051 NI::setup(uint n, uint v, uint time)
00052 {
00053 
00054     vcs =v;
00055     max_sim_time = time;
00056     no_nodes = n;
00057     packets = 0;
00058     total_missed_time = 0;
00059     packets_out = 0;
00060     total_backward_time = 0;
00061     missed_time = 0;
00062     avg_resp_buff_occ = 0;
00063     resp_buff_occ_cycles = 0;
00064     address = myId();
00065     node_ip = address/3;
00066     last_vc = 0;
00067     flast_vc = 0;
00068     ((MC*)mc)->id = node_ip;    
00069     ready.resize( vcs );
00070     outstanding_hlp.resize( vcs );
00071     ready.insert( ready.begin(), ready.size(), false );
00072     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < vcs; i++)
00073         ready[i] = true;
00074 
00075 
00076    //  send ready events for each virtual channel
00077 
00078       //  IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00079       //  event->type = DETECT_DEADLOCK_EVENT;
00080       //  Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00081     return ;
00082 } /* ----- end of function GenericTPG::setup ----- */

00107 void 
00108 NI::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00109 {
00110     switch(e->type)
00111     {
00112         case NEW_PACKET_EVENT:
00113             handle_new_packet_event(e);
00114             break;
00115         case OUT_PULL_EVENT:
00116             handle_out_pull_event(e);
00117             break;
00118         case READY_EVENT:
00119             handle_ready_event(e);
00120             break;
00121         //case DETECT_DEADLOCK_EVENT:
00122           //  handle_detect_deadlock_event(e);
00123             //break;
00124         default:
00125             cout << "NI:: Unk event exception" << endl;
00126             break;
00127     }
00128     return ;
00129 } /* ----- end of function GenericTPG::process_event ----- */

00131 void NI::add_mc_bits(Request *req)
00132 {
00133     //cout << "Address before adding mcbits 0x" << hex << req->address << endl; 
00134     md_paddr_t addr = req->address;
00135     unsigned int temp = MC_ADDR_BITS;   
00136     ullint temp2 = temp-(int)log2(no_mcs);   
00137 
00138     ullint lower_mask = (uint)pow(2.0,temp2*1.0)-1;
00139     md_paddr_t upper_mask = ~lower_mask;//(ullint)((0xFFFFFFFF)-(pow(2.0,temp*1.0)-1));
00140 
00141     ullint lower_addr = (addr) & lower_mask;
00142     md_paddr_t upper_addr = ((addr) & upper_mask) << (int)log2(no_mcs);
00143 
00144     vector<unsigned int>::iterator itr;
00145     itr = find(mc_positions.begin(), mc_positions.end(), node_ip);
00146     
00147     md_paddr_t mc_addr =((itr-mc_positions.begin()) << temp2); 
00148 
00149     req->address = upper_addr | lower_addr | mc_addr;
00150 #ifdef _DEBUG
00151 cout << endl << hex << "Adding McBits 0x" << req->address << " upper_mask 0x" << upper_mask << " lower_mask 0x" << lower_mask << " Upper Addr 0x" <<  upper_addr <<  " Lower Addr 0x" << lower_addr << " mc_addr 0x" << mc_addr << " 0x" << (itr-mc_positions.begin()) <<  endl;
00152 #endif
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 void NI::strip_mc_bits(Request *req)
00157 {       
00158     md_paddr_t addr = req->address;
00159     ullint temp = MC_ADDR_BITS;   
00160     ullint temp2 = temp-(int)log2(no_mcs);   
00161     ullint lower_mask = (uint)pow(2.0,temp2*1.0)-1;
00162     md_paddr_t upper_mask = (ullint)((0xFFFFFFFFFFFF)-(pow(2.0,temp*1.0)-1));
00163     ullint lower_addr = (addr) & lower_mask;
00164     md_paddr_t upper_addr = ((addr) & upper_mask) >> (int)log2(no_mcs);
00165 
00166 #ifdef GLOBAL_XOR
00167     short int tempBits = (int)log2(NO_OF_THREADS) - (int)log2(no_mcs);
00168     short int tempFactor = ((id >> tempBits) & (no_mcs-1));
00169     short int mc_addr = (((addr) >> temp2) & (no_mcs-1)) ^ tempFactor;
00170 #else    
00171     short int mc_addr = ((addr) >> temp2) & (no_mcs-1);
00172 #endif
00173     vector<unsigned int>::iterator itr;
00174     itr = find(mc_positions.begin(), mc_positions.end(), node_ip);
00175     //cout << "Before stripping address 0x" << hex << req->address;
00176     req->address = upper_addr | lower_addr;
00177 #ifdef _DEBUG
00178 cout << endl << hex << "Stripping Address 0x" << req->address << " upper_mask 0x" << upper_mask << " lower_mask 0x" << lower_mask << " Upper Addr 0x" <<  upper_addr <<  " Lower Addr 0x" << lower_addr << " mc_addr 0x" << mc_addr << " 0x" << (itr-mc_positions.begin()) <<  endl;
00179 #endif
00180     assert(mc_addr== (itr-mc_positions.begin() ) );
00181 }

00185 void 
00186 NI::handle_new_packet_event(IrisEvent* e)
00187 {
00188     ni_recv = false;
00189         //cout << "Interface size " << interface_connections.size() << endl;
00190 //    _DBG_NOARG("I reached here");
00191 #ifdef _DEBUG
00192     _DBG(" NI handle_new_packet_event %s \n Int from is %s %d", e->toString().c_str(), interface_connections[0]->toString().c_str(),e->vc);
00193     cout << endl;       
00194 #endif
00195     HighLevelPacket* hlp = NULL;
00196     if(e->src_id == interface_connections[0]->address)
00197     {   
00198         hlp = static_cast<HighLevelPacket*>(e->event_data.at(0));
00199         outstanding_hlp[hlp->virtual_channel] = hlp; //static_cast<HighLevelPacket*>(e->event_data.at(0));
00200     }
00201      
00202    bool found = false;;
00203    for( uint i=flast_vc+1; i<vcs; i++)
00204    if( outstanding_hlp[i]!=NULL)
00205    {
00206          hlp = outstanding_hlp[i];
00207          flast_vc = i;
00208          found = true;
00209          break;
00210    }
00211    if( !found)
00212         for( uint i=0; i<=flast_vc;i++)
00213             if( outstanding_hlp[i]!=NULL)
00214             {
00215                   hlp = outstanding_hlp[i];
00216                   flast_vc = i;
00217                   found = true;
00218                   break;
00219             }
00220  
00221    
00222    if (!((MC*)mc)->reqH->oneBufferFull && hlp!=NULL)
00223     {
00224 
00225         Request* req = new Request();
00226         convertFromBitStream(req, hlp);
00227         req->startTime = hlp->req_start_time;
00228         req->hop_count = hlp->hop_count;
00229         req->avg_network_latency = hlp->avg_network_latency;
00230         req->arrivalTime = hlp->recv_time;      
00231         total_missed_time += (ullint)(ceil(Simulator::Now()) - hlp->recv_time);
00232         packets++;
00233         last_pkt_out_cycle = (ullint)ceil(Simulator::Now());
00234 
00235         strip_mc_bits(req);
00236 
00237 //      cout << "\n[" << Simulator::Now() << "] NI got packet " << hex << req->address << dec << " from Uncore" << req->threadId << endl;
00238         IrisEvent *e2 = new IrisEvent();
00239         e2->src = this;
00240         e2->dst = ((MC*)mc)->reqH;
00241         e2->event_data.push_back((void*)req);
00242         e2->type = START;       
00243         Simulator::Schedule(ceil(Simulator::Now())+1, &RequestHandler::process_event, (RequestHandler*)e2->dst, e2);    
00244 
00245         // send back a ready event
00246         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00247         event->type = READY_EVENT;
00248         event->vc = hlp->virtual_channel;       
00249         Simulator::Schedule( ceil(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, interface_connections[0], event);      
00250         outstanding_hlp[hlp->virtual_channel] = NULL;
00251         delete hlp;
00252     }
00253     else
00254     {
00255         if(hlp)
00256         {
00257             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00258             event->type = NEW_PACKET_EVENT;
00259             event->event_data.push_back(hlp);
00260             event->src_id = address;
00261             event->vc = hlp->virtual_channel;
00262             Simulator::Schedule(floor(Simulator::Now())+ 1, 
00263                                 &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00264             ni_recv = true;
00265         }
00266 
00267 /*        if(hlp!=NULL)
00268         {
00269                 if (e->src_id != interface_connections[0]->address)
00270                         cout << Simulator::Now() << " minhaj" << endl;  
00271                 else
00272                         cout << Simulator::Now() << " mitch" << endl;
00273             outstanding_hlp[hlp->virtual_channel] = hlp; //static_cast<HighLevelPacket*>(e->event_data.at(0));
00274         }
00275         else
00276         {
00277             cout << Simulator::Now() << " Dhruv" << endl;
00278             assert(e->src_id != interface_connections[0]->address);     
00279             for( uint i=0; i<vcs; i++)
00280                 outstanding_hlp[i] = NULL;
00281         }
00282 */
00283     }
00284     delete e;
00285     return ;
00286 }
00287 
00288 void 
00289 NI::handle_out_pull_event(IrisEvent* e)
00290 {
00291     bool found = false;
00292     uint sending_vc = -1;
00293     for( uint i=last_vc+1; i<vcs; i++)
00294         if( ready[i])
00295         {
00296             found = true;
00297             sending_vc = i;
00298             last_vc = i;
00299             break;
00300         }
00301     if ( !found)
00302     {
00303         for ( uint i=0; i<=last_vc; i++)
00304             if( ready[i])
00305             {
00306                 found = true;
00307                 sending_vc = i;
00308                 last_vc = i;
00309                 break;
00310             }
00311     }
00312 
00313 
00314     Request* req = new Request();
00315     if ( found && GetFromNIQueue(req))
00316     {
00317         avg_resp_buff_occ += ((MC*)mc)->responseH->responseBuffer.size();
00318         resp_buff_occ_cycles++;
00319         //        if( ((MC*)mc)->responseH->responseBuffer.size() > 64)
00320         //            cout << " Resp buffer exceeded Time: " << Simulator::Now() << " size: " << ((MC*)mc)->responseH->responseBuffer.size()<< endl;
00321 
00322         //  Send a high level packet now 
00323             vector<Request>::iterator queueIndex = niQueue.begin();     
00324             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00325             HighLevelPacket* hlp = new HighLevelPacket();
00326             event->type = NEW_PACKET_EVENT;
00327             hlp->virtual_channel = sending_vc;
00328             hlp->source = node_ip;
00329             hlp->recv_time = (ullint)Simulator::Now();  
00330                 add_mc_bits(req);
00331             hlp->addr = req->address;
00332             hlp->destination = req->threadId;
00333             hlp->transaction_id = 1000;
00334                 hlp->msg_class = RESPONSE_PKT;
00335             hlp->req_start_time = req->startTime;
00336             hlp->hop_count = req->hop_count;
00337             hlp->avg_network_latency = req->avg_network_latency;
00338             hlp->waiting_in_ni = (ullint)Simulator::Now() - req->retireTime;
00339             hlp->stat_memory_serviced_time = req->retireTime - req->arrivalTime;
00340         
00341                 convertToBitStream(req, hlp);      
00342 #ifdef _DEBUG
00343             cout << dec << "\n[" << Simulator::Now() << "] Sending packet from NI 0x" << hex << req->address << endl;
00344 #endif
00345         hlp->sent_time = (ullint)Simulator::Now();
00346         total_backward_time += ((ullint)Simulator::Now() - req->retireTime);
00347         packets_out++;
00348 
00349         event->event_data.push_back(hlp);
00350         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event,interface_connections[0], event);
00351 
00352         ready[sending_vc] = false;
00353         niQueue.erase(queueIndex);
00354 
00355         IrisEvent* event3 = new IrisEvent();
00356         event3->type = SEND_TO_NI; //ask response handler for more
00357         event3->dst = ((MC*)mc)->responseH; //e->vc;
00358         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &ResponseHandler::process_event, (ResponseHandler*)event3->dst, event3);
00359 
00360         last_out_pull_cycle = Simulator::Now();
00361     }
00362 
00363     else
00364         sending = false;
00365 
00366     delete req; 
00367     delete e;
00368 }

00381 
00382 void 
00383 NI::handle_ready_event(IrisEvent* e)
00384 {
00385     if ( e->vc > vcs )
00386     {
00387         _DBG(" Got ready for vc %d no_vcs %d ", e->vc, vcs);
00388         exit(1);
00389     }
00390 //    _DBG(" NI GOT READY %d",e->vc);
00391 if( ready[e->vc] )
00392 {
00393     cout << " Error Recv incorrect READY !" << endl;
00394     exit(1);
00395 }
00396     ready[e->vc] = true;
00397     // send the next packet if it is less than the current time
00398     if( Simulator::Now() < max_sim_time )
00399     {
00400         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00401         event->type = OUT_PULL_EVENT;
00402         event->vc = e->vc;
00403         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00404         sending = true;
00405     }
00406     delete e;
00407 }

00469     {   
00470         *req = niQueue[0];
00471 //        niQueue.erase(queueIndex);

00478 void 
00479 NI::convertToBitStream(Request* req, HighLevelPacket *hlp)
00480 {
00481     //cout << "HLP data " << endl;
00482     for ( uint i=0 ; i < NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS ; i++ )
00483     {
00484                 bool bit = (bool)((req->address >> i) & 0x1); 
00485                 hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00486     }
00487     //cout << endl;
00488     /*    for ( uint i=0 ; i < NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS ; i++ )
00489           {
00490                   bool bit = (bool)((req->cmdType >> i) & 0x1); 
00491           hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00492           }
00493           for( uint i=0 ; i < NETWORK_THREADID_BITS ; i++ )
00494           {
00495               bool bit = (bool)((req->threadId >> i) & 0x1); 
00496           hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00497     }
00498 */   
00499     
00500     if (req->cmdType == CACHE_READ || req->cmdType == CACHE_WRITE || req->cmdType == CACHE_PREFETCH)
00501         for ( uint i= hlp->data.size(); i < (8*CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE - max_phy_link_bits); i++ )
00502         {
00503             bool bit = false;   // sending 0's as data 
00504             hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00505         }
00506 
00507     hlp->data_payload_length = (ullint)ceil(hlp->data.size() *1.0 / max_phy_link_bits);
00508     hlp->data_payload_length = hlp->data_payload_length * max_phy_link_bits;
00509         
00510     for ( uint i=hlp->data.size(); i < hlp->data_payload_length; i++ )
00511     {
00512         bool bit = false; 
00513         hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00514     } 
00515 }
00516 
00517 void 
00518 NI::convertFromBitStream(Request* req, HighLevelPacket *hlp)
00519 {
00520     req->address = 0;   
00521     for (unsigned int i=0; i < NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS; i++)
00522     {
00523         ullint bit = hlp->data[i];
00524         req->address = req->address | (bit << i);
00525     }
00526     unsigned int temp = 0;
00527     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS; i++)
00528     {
00529         temp = temp | (hlp->data[i+NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS] << i);
00530     }
00531     req->cmdType = (cache_command)temp;
00532 
00533     req->threadId = 0;
00534     for (unsigned int i=0; i < NETWORK_THREADID_BITS; i++)
00535     {
00536         req->threadId = req->threadId | (hlp->data[i+NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS+NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS] << i);
00537     }
00538 /*     req->data.value = 0;
00539     if (req->cmdType == CACHE_WRITEBACK)
00540         for ( uint i=0 ; i < 8*WRITEBACK_SIZE ; i++ )
00541         {
00542             req->data.value = req->data.value | (hlp->data[i+NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS+NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS+NETWORK_THREADID_BITS] << i);
00543             req->data.size = WRITEBACK_SIZE;
00544         }*/
00545 }
00546 
00547 string
00548 NI::print_stats() const
00549 {
00550     stringstream str;
00551 //    str << "\n NI addr: " << address <<endl;
00552     ((MC*)mc)->stats->CalculateAggregateStats();
00553     str << ((MC*)mc)->stats->PrintAggregateStats(node_ip);
00554     str << "NI [" << node_ip << "] " << "last_pkt_out_cycle:\t" << last_pkt_out_cycle << endl;
00555     str << "NI [" << node_ip << "] " << "total_missed_time:\t" << total_missed_time<< endl;
00556     str << "NI [" << node_ip << "] " << "packets_in:\t" << packets << endl;
00557     str << "NI [" << node_ip << "] " << "packets_out:\t" << packets_out << endl;
00558     str << "NI [" << node_ip << "] " << "total_backward_time:\t" << total_backward_time << endl;
00559     str << "NI [" << node_ip << "] " << "avg_latency_waiting_in_ni(fwd path):\t" << (total_missed_time+0.0)/packets << endl;
00560     str << "NI [" << node_ip << "] " << "avg_latency_waiting_in_ni(bwd path):\t" << (total_backward_time+0.0)/packets_out << endl;
00561     if ( resp_buff_occ_cycles != 0)
00562         str << "NI [" << node_ip << "] " << "Resp buff occ:\t" << avg_resp_buff_occ/resp_buff_occ_cycles<< endl;
00563 
00564     return str.str();
00565 }
